previous.title: "Microsoft just moved from supporting character in advertising to a main character." The tech company's deal with Netflix reignites its online-ad ambitions. https://t.co/369XBMc15e

localize.full_text: 「マイクロソフトは、広告の脇役から主役に躍り出た。ネットフリックスとの契約により、ハイテク企業のオンライン広告の野望が再燃 https://t.co/369XBMc15e.
"微软刚刚从广告的配角变成了主角"。这家科技公司与Netflix的交易重新点燃了其在线广告的雄心。https://t.co/369XBMc15e
"微軟剛剛從廣告的配角變成了主角"。這家科技公司與Netflix的交易重新點燃了其在線廣告的雄心。https://t.co/369XBMc15e

next.title: Elon Musk filed a motion opposing Twitter’s request to expedite a trial over his attempt to end his $44 billion takeover https://t.co/NE91yzbrfS
